# eci_region (Data Source)

Region

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "eci_region" "region_seoul1" {
  name="seoul-1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) human-readable name of the region

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) unique identifier of the region
